title: Tennis no Oujisama - Cat Life (Doujinshi)
description: Each of the three stories focuses on Inui finding a cat. It just so happens the cat reminds him of someone very special to him. And most of the time, Inui sees the cat as his VIP – so yes, Kaidoh catboy abounds!

matches.title: Boku no Hero Academia - Neko hon (Doujinshi)
